name: The Trail Grows Cold
description:
The Trail Grows Cold

Ben, a mild mannered family man from the city, finds himself lost in the cold. Alone in the woods at night and without any kind of protection. Does he possess the strength to become the person that he needs to be in order to get back to his family?

Controls

Arrow keys for movement

Spacebar to jump (When applicable)
